original_text: And all the trees of the field shall know that I the Lord have brought down the high tree, have exalted the low tree, have dried up the green tree, and have made the dry tree to flourish: I the Lord have spoken and have done it.
korean_text: 들의 모든 나무가 나 여호와는 높은 나무를 낮추고 낮은 나무를 높이며 푸른 나무를 말리고 마른 나무를 무성하게 하는 줄 알리라 나 여호와는 말하고 이루느니라 하라

sentences.original_text: And all the trees of the field shall know
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 밭의 모든 나무가 알게 되리라

sentences.original_text: that I the Lord have brought down the high tree
have dried up the green tree
and have made the dry tree to flourish
